tweet: b'Thank you to my band and my crew for two seamless shows. And a huge thank you to everyone from BST, an absolutely impeccably run event, you looked after the crowds so well and I\xe2\x80\x99m so honored to have been asked to perform this year  so thank you! See you really soon \xe2\x99\xa5\xef\xb8\x8f https://t.co/v3d36k0rbi'

b'Hyde Park Night 2! My heart is absolutely full! I\xe2\x80\x99ll never forget these shows with you, slap bang in the middle of London, outdoors, during Pride weekend! You brought everything and more! Thank you so so much for having me. Thank you to the entire line up you were all incredible. https://t.co/1j8Kib05My'
b'Thank you my loves, I can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to do it all again tonight \xe2\x99\xa5\xef\xb8\x8f https://t.co/tTPniZptfh'

b"The line up for my Hyde Park shows next week is going to blow your socks off!! An all female bill, from new artists that I'm obsessed with to the heavenly @KaceyMusgraves to one of my favorite artists of all time @GabrielleUk who I\xe2\x80\x99ve loved since I was 4!! https://t.co/0Xh6pFjMgv"

b'What a difference a year makes! If time keeps healing & smoothing out all the creases in my life like it does as the years fly by, then I can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to be 60! I\xe2\x80\x99ve never been happier! So many lessons, so many blessings to be grateful for. This is 34, & I love it here!Thank you x https://t.co/fxD57Mjn9F'

b'It was so much fun, people were wild, I was reunited with my favourite teacher from school when I was a teenager, Scary Spice was there, my fans were there and it was just the best, knees up of a night \xf0\x9f\x87\xac\xf0\x9f\x87\xa7'

b'I did a show at home in London last year that is going to be on NBC tomorrow night!! It was a show I used to watch growing up called \xe2\x80\x98An Audience With\xe2\x80\x99. https://t.co/kFMmvw8ysF'
